mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.username, u.create_ip AS createIp, u.email, u.group_id AS groupId, u.enabled, u.login_time AS loginTime, g.name AS groupName FROM sys_user u RIGHT JOIN sys_manager a ON a.id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_group g ON g.id=u.group_id WHERE u.trashed = 0 AND a.builtin = 0 ORDER BY u.create_time ASC
